scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos && if exist cypress\cucumber-json rmdir /q /s cypress\cucumber-json
scripts.test: npm run start || npm run posttest
